Entries.Rainy_Day_4: It's raining a lot.#$b#There is something calming about making love when it's raining.$4#$e#Don't come back too late tonight.$4
Entries.Outdoor_4: Good morning! I was wondering when you'd finally roll out of bed!$h#$e#It's okay though... You deserve a good night of rest after last night.$4
Entries.summer_7: I'll never forget that bear that showed up on our camping trip.#$b#Surprised by a bear during my first time... I don't think many people can say the same.$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#I swept the whole house, washed the windows, dusted, and cleaned the fridge. It was a very productive day!#Maybe someday when we retire, you and I can travel the world, like my parents. At least just for a little bit.$u
